segments.text: Hello , Pratt . How was your interview yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Finn . I did a wonderful job and I was employed . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry to tell you that I have lost the opportunity .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? You are so excellent . I think you are the most suitable person for the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know I am excellent , but I pay no attention to the etiquette you ’ Ve told me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? Then what did you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I entered the room , I forgot to close the door . Later , I couldn ’ t help smoking , you know I am a heavy-smoker . What ’ s more , I forgot to polish my shoes . There is some dirt on it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so careless . You know they are the basic rules you should follow before you attend an interview . Do remember not to smoke any more , otherwise , you can ’ t find a job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know . And next time I must make good preparations .
segments.speaker: S1
